description: Returns information about a DataSync discovery job.

parameters.name: DiscoveryJobArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the discovery job that you want information about.

nested_items.name: StorageSystemArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the on-premises storage system you're running the discovery job on.

nested_items.name: DiscoveryJobArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the discovery job.

nested_items.name: CollectionDurationMinutes
nested_items.description: The number of minutes that the discovery job runs.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of a discovery job. For more information, see Discovery job statuses.

nested_items.name: JobStartTime
nested_items.description: The time when the discovery job started.

nested_items.name: JobEndTime
nested_items.description: The time when the discovery job ended.
